justification: Candidate has extensive experience in sales and marketing roles, indicating strong capability for the sales management requirement.
Demonstrated leadership through mentoring and training roles, relevant for the leadership skills sought by Acme Corp.
Proficiency with CRM tools like Salesforce is indicated, aligning with job requirements for CRM usage.
Proven successful track record in achieving sales targets, relevant for sales experience.

requirements.criteria: Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce)

input.job_description:
## Join Our Dynamic Team as a Senior Sales and Marketing Executive

### Position Overview

[Acme Corp], a leader in providing cutting-edge digital marketing solutions, is on the hunt for a driven **Senior Sales and Marketing Executive** to play a key role in our growing team. You’ll leverage your skills in sales management, business development, and digital marketing to drive business growth and maximize client satisfaction. Use your talent in leadership to mentor our young team, ensuring we hit key business targets while setting new standards in the industry.

### Key Responsibilities
- Drive sales strategies to achieve performance targets and expand our market reach.
- Manage end-to-end sales processes including customer prospecting, lead generation, and closing sales. 
- Work collaboratively with the digital marketing team to conceive, manage, and execute marketing campaigns.
- Utilize CRM tools such as HubSpot for tracking and analytics to boost sales efficiency.
- Conduct market research and data analysis to inform business strategies.
- Mentor new hires and facilitate continuous professional development.

### Essential Skills and Experience
- Proven experience in sales management and digital marketing (5+ years preferred).
- Strong command over marketing automation tools and CRMs like HubSpot and Salesforce.
- Ability to set strategic goals with excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
- Aptitude for data visualization and analytics to drive informed marketing decisions.
- Familiarity with SEO, SEM, email marketing campaigns, and business intelligence tools.
- Demonstrated proficiency in leading and supervising a dynamic team environment.

### What We Offer
- Competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.
- Opportunity to work with an innovative team and environment.
- Continuous learning opportunities and growth potential within the company.

Join us to make an impact on the digital landscape and drive success!
input.additional_info: At Acme Corp, we prioritize candidates from diverse educational backgrounds with proven experience in high-pressure sales environments. We welcome graduates from reputable institutions but hold no particular preference for any university. Relocation support is available on a case-by-case basis. Skills assessment will include a practical marketing project to gauge capability in real-world scenarios, complemented by personal interviews to evaluate cultural fit and growth potential.
minimum_requirements: Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
Proficiency in CRM software (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce)

details.name: Muhammad Bilal Amin
details.executive_summary: Muhammad Bilal Amin is a skilled professional with extensive experience in sales management and data analysis, having held key positions in reputable companies such as Signify Pakistan and Toyota Pakistan. He has demonstrated a strong ability to improve operational efficiency and drive sales growth through effective planning and forecasting.

employment_history.details: Managing total of 15 Accounts Including both End Users and Channel Partners for Retail & Hospitality Business Across Pakistan. Managing the largest EU account with approx. 700K EUR business for Signify Pakistan. Started engagement with 10 different new fashion retail potential accounts in line with Signify’s expansion strategy in R&H segment. Delivered and exceeded both top line and bottom-line targets with 120% attainment in topline in Q4 2022.

Improved the efficiency of the planning cycle with timely delivery of forecasting and planning report by at least 10%. Made a reconciliation and availability tool for the better planning of CBU vehicles. Improve the MOM CBU invoicing performance by 100%. Strong coordination between marketing, sales, and planning team to get the optimum demand forecast based on n+3 approach.

Was part of the launch team for Toyota Gateway Motors. Ensure all the branding is accurately done before the dealership launch. Learned and understood all the Toyota Policies and procedures for dealership opening. Researched the current dealership data across Pakistan auto sector and created a dashboard (Power BI) analyzing the dealership data in Pakistan in different metrics (dealership counts, geographies, average sales per dealership etc.).

Supported in Product Roadmap for the coming future portfolios. Conducting a successful training for SFDC to Sub Sahara Africa Market with more than 17 people in training. Conducted anonymous market visits to get the primary insights of the current market/competition situation. Hands on command on Vistex Tool, trained the PMs in Pakistan on the use of Vistex. Communicating with the Marcom team regarding the ongoing and upcoming campaigns. Achieved 15% improvement in data quality of pricing activities by collaborating with regional commercial operations team to achieve monthly targets. Increased profitability by 10% by forecasting channel sales and IGM with 95% accuracy. Improved decision making by providing comprehensive weekly performance reports to the commercial head, resulting in a 20% improvement.

Coordinated national sales for professional lighting, resulting in 15% sales growth. Improved sales team productivity by 20% as key user for Sales Force Dot Com. Provided weekly performance reports to commercial director, improving accuracy and timeliness by 25%. Improved sales and profitability forecasting accuracy by 5%, resulting in a 10% profit increase.
